name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War Franchise Collection
summary:
Dawn of War Franchise Collection includes:

- Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War - Game of the Year Edition
- Warhammer 40,000: Dawn Of War – Winter Assault
- Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War - Dark Crusade
- Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War - Soulstorm
- Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II
- Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II Chaos Rising
- All DLC Packs for Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II
- Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II: Retribution
- All DLC Packs for Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II - Retribution
